channel.title: [317] 4 questions for help please [317]
channel.description:
Hi could anybody help me on the following questions
[ul][li][s]How do i change the xp rate? (combat && skilling) (training is way to fast)[/s][/li] [li]How do i make the teleport buttons work[/li] [li]How do i add ancients/alter and spellbook[/li] [li]How do i add special attack's[/li][/ul]
Can anybody help me on these 4 problems please
